Question: Discovery Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Discovery Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd

Product: Smart Modular Motherboard Solution

- Specialized in smart modular motherboard solution for smart kitchen and environmental appliances products
- Main chip solution covers MTK, Qualcomm, Rockchip, Hisilicon, Spreadtrum platforms
- Operating platforms based on Android, Linux, RTOS, MCU
- Provides CKD and SKD business for oversea plant production, Saas design, and cloud deploy service
- Supports HW&FW&SW turnkey solution, advanced production facilities
- Customers include Whirlpool, LIDL, Kohler, Starbucks, and more
- Offers features like appliance embedded with personalized recipe, cross SKU promotion, data analysis, online community interaction, self-developed App for remote control, OTA upgrade, and third-party application scenarios
- Provides ODM services for smart products, embedded software, IoT communication modules, touch panel HMI, and AI devices
Summary_cn:
发现科技（深圳）有限公司

产品：智能模块化主板解决方案

- 专注于智能厨房和环境电器产品的智能模块化主板解决方案
- 主要芯片解决方案涵盖MTK、高通、瑞芯微、海思、展讯平台
- 基于Android、Linux、RTOS、MCU等操作平台
- 为海外工厂生产提供CKD和SKD业务，提供SaaS设计和云部署服务
- 支持HW&FW&SW一站式解决方案，先进的生产设施
- 客户包括惠而浦、LIDL、科勒、星巴克等
- 提供个性化食谱嵌入电器、不同SKU促销、数据分析、在线社区互动、远程控制的自研App、OTA升级和第三方应用场景等功能
- 为智能产品、嵌入式软件、物联网通信模块、触摸面板HMI和AI设备提供ODM服务
